title: 13 inch macbook pro 820 3115 not switching on, all looks dead.
message:
Not switching on, when connecting power, no green/red light on charge connector. Charge voltage is getting into the board
Found short at C6994 and C6999, removed and shirt still there. Removed U6990, short still there. 
From what I can see on a schematic it should be pp3v42_g3h_reg coming out of u6990. Where does pp3v42_g3h_reg? From what I have found on the schematic it goes to the SMC so am I correct in thinking it is the SMC either failed and shorted to ground or something different?
Thanks

title: 13 inch macbook pro 820 3115 not switching on, all looks dead.
message: Inject voltage on 3V42 bus and see what heats up. Start low and measure current, don't go over 3.4V of course.

title: 13 inch macbook pro 820 3115 not switching on, all looks dead.
message: Bitch, should have though of that already. Will do
